ns0:entry.ns0:title: ChrisTitusTech/linutil
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/linutil
Language: shell
Chris Titus Tech's Linux Toolbox - Linutil is a distro-agnostic toolbox designed to simplify everyday Linux tasks.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: WhatsApp/proxy
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/WhatsApp/proxy
Language: shell
This repository contains the WhatsApp proxy implementation for users to host their own proxy infrastructure to connect to WhatsApp for chat (VoIP is not currently supported)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: mylinuxforwork/dotfiles
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/mylinuxforwork/dotfiles
Language: shell
The ML4W Dotfiles for Hyprland - An advanced and full-featured configuration for the dynamic tiling window manager Hyprland. Ready to install with the Dotfiles Installer app with setup scripts for Arch, Fedora and openSuse.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-openwrt
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-openwrt
Language: shell
Support for OpenWrt in Amlogic, Rockchip and Allwinner boxes. Support a311d, s922x, s905x3, s905x2, s912, s905d, s905x, s905w, s905, s905l, rk3588, rk3568, rk3399, rk3328, h6, etc.
